fullplot: Sean Casey is the newest member of the district attorneys office and he is close to uncovering a police scandal that might involve his father Liam, who works for the NYPD. Then his father is critically wounded in a stake-out, Sean is chosen to prosecute the case.
plot: A newly elected District attorney finds himself in the middle of a police corruption investigation that may involve his father and his partner.
title: Night Falls on Manhattan
